titles.title: A bill to designate the United States courthouse located in Houma, Louisiana, as the "George Arceneaux, Jr. United States Courthouse", and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S14277-14278)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

bill.summary: 10/25/1993--Introduced. Designates the United States courthouse located at 800 East Main Street in Houma, Louisiana, as the George Arceneaux, Jr., United States Courthouse.
